Components API Reference

This section documents the component classes for memory, planners, and gateways.

Memory

InMemoryMemory

class agent_framework.components.memory.InMemoryMemory(agent_key: str = 'default')[source]

Bases: BaseMemory

Basic, single-agent, in-memory message history.

__init__(agent_key: str = 'default') → None[source]
add(message: Dict[str, Any]) → None[source]
get_history() → List[Dict[str, Any]][source]

SharedInMemoryMemory

class agent_framework.components.memory.SharedInMemoryMemory(namespace: str, agent_key: str)[source]

Bases: BaseMemory

Shared, namespaced, in-memory message history for multi-agent collaboration.

__init__(namespace: str, agent_key: str) → None[source]
add(message: Dict[str, Any]) → None[source]
add_global(update: Dict[str, Any]) → None[source]

Broadcast an update to all agents sharing this namespace.

Useful for passing observations/results between workers in multi-step flows.

get_global_updates() → List[Dict[str, Any]][source]

Get all global updates in this namespace.

get_history() → List[Dict[str, Any]][source]

HierarchicalSharedMemory

class agent_framework.components.memory.HierarchicalSharedMemory(namespace: str, agent_key: str, subordinates: List[str] | None = None)[source]

Bases: SharedInMemoryMemory

Manager-specific memory viewer that sees subordinate and global history.

__init__(namespace: str, agent_key: str, subordinates: List[str] | None = None) → None[source]
get_history() → List[Dict[str, Any]][source]

Memory Presets

Memory Presets for Framework v2.

Presets provide simplified memory configurations that auto-derive namespace and agent_key from the agent context.

Usage in YAML:
memory:

$preset: worker

Available presets:

  • standalone: Isolated memory for single agents (InMemoryMemory)

  • worker: Shared memory for worker agents (SharedInMemoryMemory)

  • manager: Hierarchical memory that sees subordinates (HierarchicalSharedMemory)

agent_framework.components.memory_presets.get_memory_preset(preset_name: str, context: Dict[str, Any] | None = None) → Any[source]

Get a memory instance from a preset.

Parameters:

  • preset_name Name of the preset (standalone, worker, manager)

  • context Optional context dict with: - agent_name: Name of the agent (used to derive agent_key) - namespace or JOB_ID: Namespace for shared memory - subordinates: List of subordinate agent names (for manager preset)

Returns:

Memory instance configured according to the preset

Raises:

ValueError If preset_name is not recognized

Example

>>> memory = get_memory_preset("worker", {"agent_name": "ResearchWorker"})
>>> memory = get_memory_preset("manager", {
...     "agent_name": "Orchestrator",
...     "subordinates": ["research-worker", "task-worker"]
... })
agent_framework.components.memory_presets.list_memory_presets() → List[str][source]

List available memory preset names.

agent_framework.components.memory_presets.describe_preset(preset_name: str) → str[source]

Get description for a preset.
